org.apache.juneau.csv

Class CsvSerializerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContext
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerContext
          • org.apache.juneau.csv.CsvSerializerContext

  • public final class CsvSerializerContext
extends SerializerContext
    Configurable properties on the CsvSerializer class.

    Context properties are set by calling PropertyStore.setProperty(String, Object) on the property store passed into the constructor.

    See PropertyStore for more information about context properties.

    Inherited configurable properties:
    • BeanContext - Properties associated with handling beans on serializers and parsers.
      • SerializerContext - Configurable properties common to all serializers.
